GetClassType.name: GetClassType
GetClassType.description: Get the type of the class based on this base class.

SetSize.name: SetSize
SetSize.description: Set the size of the object (image, shape, chart) bounding box.

params.name: nWidth
params.description: The object width measured in English measure units.

params.name: nHeight
params.description: The object height measured in English measure units.

SetPosition.name: SetPosition
SetPosition.description: Set the position of the drawing on the slide.

params.name: nPosX
params.description: The distance from the left side of the slide to the left side of the drawing measured in English measure units.

params.name: nPosY
params.description: The distance from the top side of the slide to the upper side of the drawing measured in English measure units.
